tour_name: Highlights of Zambia, South Africa and Mozambique

locations.name: Victoria Falls
locations.description: Likely staying in Victoria Falls town (Zimbabwe) or Livingstone (Zambia), serving as the base for experiencing the immense power and beauty of the Falls and the Zambezi River.

locations.name: Sabi Sands Game Reserve
locations.description: A private game reserve bordering Kruger National Park, South Africa, renowned for luxury lodges and exceptional wildlife viewing, particularly leopards. Stays are within one of the reserve's lodges.

locations.name: Bazaruto Archipelago
locations.description: An idyllic group of islands off the coast of Mozambique, offering luxury beach lodges, white sands, turquoise waters, and excellent marine activities like snorkelling and diving.
